entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
